edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.model
Class SearchManager.ResultsPair

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.model.SearchManager.ResultsPair
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<SearchManager.ResultsPair>
Enclosing class:
SearchManager
private class SearchManager.ResultsPair
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<SearchManager.ResultsPair>

A Comparable object to store the results of each file's search. The object allows for sorting based on the relevance of each search results, so we can provide a list of search results ordered by relevance.

Field Summary
private  FileMetadata file
          The file that was searched.
private  int occurrences
          The number of times this result was found in the file.
